com.camerontec.catalys.server

Class CatalysServerLifecycleRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.CatalysServerLifecycleRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICatalysServerLifecycleListener

    public final class CatalysServerLifecycleRegistry
extends Object
implements ICatalysServerLifecycleListener
    Singleton registry implementation for ICatalysServerLifecycleListener implementations.

    The CatalysServer delivers lifecycle events to this instance which forwards them on to any registered listeners.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • findListenerByType

        public ICatalysServerLifecycleListener[] findListenerByType(Class<?> type,
                                                            boolean strictMatching)
        Returns an array of ICatalysServerLifecycleListener objects that are of the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - The Class object of the type.
        strictMatching - If true the class of the listener must match exactly the specified type, if false the listener can be a subclass of type.
        Returns:
        Array of found listeners or empty array if no matching listener is found.

      • findListenerByType

        public ICatalysServerLifecycleListener[] findListenerByType(Class<?> type)
        Shortcut for findListenerByType(type, true).
        Parameters:
        type - The Class object of the type.
        Returns:
        Array of found listeners or empty array if no matching listener is found.
